name: Custard & Mustard's Big Adventure
description:
Ordinary dogs? We're not ordinary dogs! We're Custard and Mustard - and we're looking for adventure!

It's fête day in Little Pottlington!

The sun is shining, the  beer is flowing, and the streets are abuzz with the excitement of it all. Down at Hockbarrow Gardens, ferrets are being raced, homemade chutneys purchased and gigantic marrows judged - while in the local museum, priceless gold and silver Romano-British artefacts are being readied for display in Britain's least secure exhibition space. 

But clouds are gathering on this most sunny of summer days, as a gang of crooks plan the most audacious robbery since the great marzipan heist of '85...

Join Custard & Mustard, the intrepid doggy duo, as they roam the streets of this sleepy town in search of adventure - and, perhaps, find more than they bargained for!

---

Custard & Mustard's Big Adventure  is a parser-based text adventure written in Adventuron.

---

Play online or download.

If downloading: unzip all files into the same folder and run index.html. The game will run locally in your web browser.
